The map is growing each session. Using chess figures to show allies and enemies.

<div id='comment z12wdzca1wm3wxroo04cifnymqn1c12y4bs'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/118285647887876243328_photo.jpg'> Michael Llaneza</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-05-17 02:07:56 (edited: 2018-05-17 02:07:56)</cite></p>
        <p>That&#39;s a grand style ! I like using chess pieces.<br /><br />This inspires me to start introducing How to Host a Dungeon to the DW community. HtHaD is a solo game about developing the backstory of an underworld through the ages, leaving it ready for delving. There&#39;s a lot of drawing a (side view) map and manipulating markers, which is what put me in mind of it.<br /><br /><a href="https://plus.google.com/communities/105103134621012592445" data-embed="COMCCNECCNACCM8CCAASQ2h0dHBzOi8vcGx1cy5nb29nbGUuY29tL2NvbW11bml0aWVzLzEwNTEwMzEzNDYyMTAxMjU5MjQ0NSNfX3NpZD1tZDA6fQiC3-XetiwSOWh0dHBzOi8vcGx1cy5nb29nbGUuY29tL2NvbW11bml0aWVzLzEwNTEwMzEzNDYyMTAxMjU5MjQ0NRo5aHR0cHM6Ly9wbHVzLmdvb2dsZS5jb20vY29tbXVuaXRpZXMvMTA1MTAzMTM0NjIxMDEyNTkyNDQ1gs-" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://plus.google.com/communities/105103134621012592445</a><br /></p>
